channel.title: Boulder, Social Science Monographs, Distributed by Columbia University Press, New York

summary.en:
The two volumes discuss the transition to and consolidation of
Democracy in Europe after the Second World War: in particulare the
purge trials against Nazi and fascist collaborators. Every country in
Europe is covered except Iceland and Eire. The analysis of neo-nazi and
neo-fascist movements is taken up to the 1980s. Bernt Hagtvet writes on
Norway with Hans Fredrik Dahl; From political mobilisation to
terrorism: the four phases of fascim in Norway (pp. 1488-1512).

publisher.name: Boulder, Social Science Monographs, Distributed by Columbia University Press, New York
